General.Name: Global Cosmed SA
General.Description: Global Cosmed S.A. produces, sells, and exports cosmetics and household chemicals in Poland and internationally. The company offers bubble baths, shower gels, liquid soaps, bath foam, bath and shower oil, body and hair wash products, shampoos, washing foam, body milk, fabric softening concentrates, washing liquids, and cleaners. It markets its products under the Apart, Bobini, Sofin, Mole, Izo, and Izozid brands. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Radom, Poland.
